thread.title: The Moorside's new trailer reveals latest twist in the controversial Karen Matthews drama

author: mirror.co.uk
title: The Moorside's new trailer reveals latest twist in the controversial Karen Matthews drama

persons.name: moorside sheridan smith karen matthews shannon matthews

text:
The Moorside's new trailer reveals latest twist in the controversial Karen Matthews drama The net starts closing in on Karen as her friend Julie Bushby starts to question the 'distraught' mum's connection to daughter Shannon's disappearance Share Comments By Suchandrika Chakrabarti Vicki Newman 12:42, 11 FEB 2017 Updated 13:02, 11 FEB 2017 TV Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch this video again Video will play in Take a sneak peek at Episode two of The Moorside Share this video Watch Next celebs Karen Matthews ' devoted friend Julie Bushby is getting suspicious in the second and last episode of acclaimed BBC One drama, The Moorside .
There are dramatic scenes as Shannon is found in this episode; Julie asks a very emotional Karen: "You won't lie to the police? Or to us?"
Julie is later shown looking sad and resigned as she is asked, "You haven't lost your faith in people, have you?"
TV viewers showered Sheridan Smith with praise for her role, after the first episode aired last week.
Julie Bushby (Sheridan Smith) demands the truth from Karen Matthews (Gemma Whelan) (Photo: BBC) Karen gets tearful as she continues to weave a tangled web of lies around her daughter's disappearance (Photo: BBC) Read More Chilling list of rules Shannon Matthews lived by give a bleak glimpse of her time in captivity Quote: : "Good to see @ Sheridansmith1 back on the tele. Amazing in everything she does. # Moorside" [sic]
"Watching The Moorside , what a brilliant actress @ Sheridansmith1 is, big fan of all the stuff she's done," wrote another.
Another fan commented: "Sheridan Smith is totally believable in every role she plays # Moorside"
And Quote: : "Sheridan Smith is an absolute belter the girl can literally play any character. Only 5 mins in and she has you glued. # Moorside"
"How amazing is @ Sheridansmith1 in Moorside. It's even hard to tell it's her brilliant," another wrote.
Julie cries as she fears the worst has happened to little Shannon (Photo: BBC) Julie gets confrontational with Karen as Shannon's disappearance stretches out from days to weeks (Photo: BBC) Read More Pictured then and now: Moorside's Karen Matthews, Craig Meehan, Julie Bushby and more And another said: "@Sheridansmith1 you are an amazing actress. Didn't want to watch Moorside but I can't stop now. So gripping."
Others said the casting for the whole show was spot on.
One said: "The casting for this is they look so much like that actually people! # Moorside # TheMoorside"
The West Yorkshire Police questioned 1,500 motorists and searched 3,000 houses.
By 5 March, more than 250 officers and 60 detectives were involved in the investigation, about 10% of the West Yorkshire force's operational strength.
It became the largest police search for a missing person since the Yorkshire Ripper investigation 30 years previously.
Karen Matthews pictured last week on her way to work (Photo: Daily Mirror) Nine-year-old Shannon Matthews (Photo: PA) Read More Revealed: The toy Karen Matthews had 'waiting' for missing Shannon Matthews when she returned home She was found on 14 March 2008 at a house in Batley Carr, a short distance from Dewsbury - which belonged to 39-year-old Michael Donovan, the uncle of Shannon’s mother Karen’s boyfriend Craig Meehan.
It soon emerged that the whole abduction had been planned by Donovan and Shannon's mother Karen to generate money from the publicity.
Shannon had been tied to a bed in the house, and given a list of rules to follow to prevent her discovery, including keeping away from windows and not making noise on the floor with her feet.

How did police uncover the sordid plan?
